commonOptionSysDescr.message:
System prompt used by the model.
Use #PAGE_TEXT_CONTENT# as the placeholder to be replaced by the content of the page.

commonOptionSysDefault.message: You are an in-browser assistant helping a user interact with a web page. Here is the page content #PAGE_TEXT_CONTENT#

QuickActionDefaultValue2.message: Please describe the page content in simple terms.

QuickActionDefaultValue3.message: Please translate the page content in english.

ollamaConfigEndpointError.message: Value should be a valid URL!

ollamaConfigModelError.message: Value should be in the <model>:<tag> format

llamacppConfigEndpointDescr.message: URL of the Llama.cpp web endpoint.

llamacppConfigEndpointError.message: Value should be a valid URL!

openaiConfigDescr.message: Can also be used for OpenAI-compatible API endpoints, by replacing the default endpoint URL. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/ for the list of avaiable models.

openaiConfigEndpointDescr.message: Custom URL of OpenAI-compatible API endpoint.

openaiConfigEndpointError.message: Value should be a valid URL!

openaiConfigModelDescr.message: The model to use (see https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/ for the list of models)
